meanings.definition: To arrange or deal with in order of importance
meanings.sent1: She prioritizes her tasks by focusing on the most important ones first.
meanings.sent2: He always prioritizes his homework before playing video games.
meanings.sent3: The cat prioritizes napping over chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: The coach prioritizes teamwork as the key to success on the field.
meanings.sent5: Prioritizing your health should always come first.

meanings.definition: To give priority to or establish as more important
meanings.sent1: The teacher prioritizes student safety above all else.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, it is crucial to prioritize helping those in need.
meanings.sent3: The robot prioritizes following its programming over all other tasks.
meanings.sent4: She prioritizes spending time with family as her top priority.
meanings.sent5: Prioritizing kindness can make a big difference in someone's day.
